Articles.Content: Whipped this up last night to celebrate 500 subscribers, not to mention I wanted to give you guys a thank you for all the kind things said about Antarctica. Thanks to GregroxMun who suggested this on the forums. It's not very good as it was rushed to meet with the subscriber milestone, and I only did half the song due to time constraints. But I guess this works right? By the way, music is "Universal" by Tree.
It's stuck in my head But very good! It's the song's fault! It's too good! ACK! I almost wish I never found this song! But it's too good! MUST. KEEP. LISTENING.
Amazing video! I wish I could be that talented

Amazing video! I wish I could be that talented

Cheers man! Really feel humbled when people say things like that

AMAZING!  The music is so catchy, too! By the way, how powerful is your computer? I have a pretty good computer, but I get about 5 to 10 fps even on default graphics settings; you're running it nearly at the max, and with graphics enhancement mods! Where did you get a computer powerful enough for that?
